text.name: info3
text.text: Scummvm is a collection of game engine recreations.

text.name: info5
text.text: Originally designed to play LucasArts adventure games

text.name: info7
text.text: it also supports a variety of non-SCUMM games by companies

text.name: info8
text.text: like Revolution Software and Adventure Soft.

text.name: info9
text.text: It was originally written by Ludvig Strigeus.

text.name: info10
